title: A petition of citizens of London. Presented to the Common Councell for their concurrence with, and thankfulnesse and submission to the Parliament; and that nothing may be done, tending to disturbe the Parliament. To the Honourable the Lord Major, aldermen, and Commons of the City of London, in Common councell assembled. The humble petition of the divers citizens and inhabitants of the said city.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed according to order, for Henry Overton, dwelling in Popes-head alley,
